mapper.update: update ecs_ad_position set position_name = #{position_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ad_width = #{ad_width,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, ad_height = #{ad_height,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, position_desc = #{position_desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, position_style = #{position_style,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where position_id = #{position_id,jdbcType=TINYINT}
mapper.select: select position_id, position_name, ad_width, ad_height, position_desc, position_style from ecs_ad_position
